sections.heading: Overview
content:
Vera Rabie-Azoory, PhD, is a psychologist with more than 20 years'
experience in family counseling, assessment, and supervision of families going
through divorce, and family mediation. She received her baccalaureate at McGill
University and her master's and doctoral degrees in psychology from the
University of Montreal. She resides in Toronto with her two children.
